about.whitelistDescription: The BP whitelist is sustained by MyvoteEOS, a BPs self-regulatory body. To eradicate the subjectivity in the whitelisting process, MyvoteEOS qualifies only those BPs who clear below four yes/no questions:
about.question1: 1. No engagement in vote compromise in any form. (Operating its own proxy with direct APR provision, buying votes from 3rd party exchanges or proxies.)
about.question2: 2. Providing public financial and operation reports on a regular basis.
about.question3: 3. No more than one BP with the same ownership.
about.question4: 4. Acknowledge that BPs can be unlisted at any time if engage with any ativities above.
about.point1: As a grace-period, BPs are not going to be requested to drop their existing vote-buy until they receive 30m to stay in the pay range.
about.point2: There's is no subjectivity in the whitelist other than above 4 criterias.
about.point3: As a grace-period, BPs are not going to be requested to drop their existing vote-buy until they receive 30m to stay in the pay range.

vote.beforeVoting: Before voting for Block producers, you must delegate your vote to the proxy.

home.description: EdenBPsProxy is a EOS BP voting proxy that maximizes voice of individual EOS holders by leveraging their voice with Eden`s fractal democracy process. Only members of Edens who revealed their identity will be eligible to have a say on the proxy that votes BPs.
